recommendations: Kia Holm Reimer ‚ÄúSimon is an amazing speaker. His passion, drive and expertise comes across in a relatable and understandable way. He is rock solid in his mission and knowledge, and speaks right into the realities of status quo, our wants, and our frustrations. Anyone would be lucky to listen in on Simon speaking. Kia Holm Reimer‚Äù

Jasmine A. Tang ‚ÄúSimon is a thought leader in his industry. As Head of the Markets desk in Goldman Australia and investment advisor at Citi, he inspired his colleagues across several departments with his daily market thoughts. His peers, juniors and even seniors looked forward to his daily market commentary. An economist turn investment advisor turn trader, Simon enjoys sharing his market views and trade ideas, which are highly sought after across the globe today. As a natural writer and speaker, one will enjoy learning from Simon. Given all this, I'd highly recommend joining one of Simon's memberships on Tao of Trading.‚Äù
